attributes.title: Rise of the Drones Preview
attributes.description_short: Meet a new breed of flying robots, from tiny swarming vehicles to giant unmanned planes.
attributes.description_long: Meet a new breed of flying robots, from tiny swarming vehicles to giant unmanned planes.

attributes.title: Swarming Drones
attributes.description_short: A University of Pennsylvania lab is developing tiny drones that sense their environment.
attributes.description_long: A University of Pennsylvania lab is developing tiny drones that sense their environment.

attributes.title: A Next-Generation Drone
attributes.description_short: The X-47B prototype can land on a flight deck without input from a pilot.
attributes.description_long: The X-47B prototype can land on a flight deck without input from a pilot.

attributes.title: Being a Drone Operator
attributes.description_short: A UAV pilot describes what it’s like to conduct a drone strike.
attributes.description_long: A UAV pilot describes what it’s like to conduct a drone strike.

attributes.title: Independent UAVs
attributes.description_short: A DARPA researcher describes what would constitute a breakthrough in UAV autonomy.
attributes.description_long: A DARPA researcher describes what would constitute a breakthrough in UAV autonomy.

attributes.title: What Drones Can See
attributes.description_short: An engineer describes the next-generation surveillance sensor for UAVs, called ARGUS.
attributes.description_long: An engineer describes the next-generation surveillance sensor for UAVs, called ARGUS.
